meanings.definition: The act of participating in karting races.
meanings.sent1: During the kartings, the racers zoomed around the track.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching kartings on weekends with my friends.
meanings.sent3: The kartings event was so exciting that even the birds stopped to watch.
meanings.sent4: His determination in kartings was like a roaring engine, unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of kartings made my heart race faster than the karts themselves.

meanings.definition: The sport or activity of driving or racing go-karts.
meanings.sent1: Kartings require skill and focus to navigate the twists and turns.
meanings.sent2: She practiced kartings every weekend to improve her speed.
meanings.sent3: In the world of kartings, even a small mistake can lead to a big crash.
meanings.sent4: His passion for kartings burned brighter than the rubber on the track.
meanings.sent5: The sound of kartings echoed through the air, filling the arena with excitement.

meanings.definition: The equipment or vehicles used in karting.
meanings.sent1: The kartings were lined up neatly, ready for the next race.
meanings.sent2: He admired the sleek design of the kartings in the showroom.
meanings.sent3: The kartings gleamed under the bright sun, looking like shiny toys.
meanings.sent4: The kartings hummed softly, waiting for their drivers to take control.
meanings.sent5: The smell of gasoline filled the air around the kartings, adding to the racing atmosphere.
